column5: No...no.  Skeet casting as part of a decathalon...definitely.
Absolutely not hahaha. If so, I want beer drinking included as well.
Bass Vaulting....Now theres a manly sport !!!
Yep !  never been into Bass...I never really target them, 90% of my catches are accidental..they're fun to catch. sorry.
here's something , include " angling " open species , mix it with Shot Put and see who can chuck'em the farthest ?
Fishing shouldn't be apart of the Olympics.

fishing belongs in the Olympics as much as wood splitting or underwater basket weaving.... If it would be an Olympic sport , it would probably end up like a Fish-O-Mania thing...I don't think that the IOC would let 300HP outboards compete.  M/O  Randy
Well... I had lots of that kind of training growing up.
Well we are finely tuned athletes......aren't we?!?!

Hell yes we are!  I think about it everytime I wake up with a hangover and a full belly. My training the next day consists of cleaning the house and planning my next outing. Nothing but, world class...
Maybe they could somehow swing it that the javelin or archery gets incorporated into fishing for carp.  Just to make it interesting!?!
Only if they limit it to hot chicks in string bikinis.
In my opinion there are already too many diversions and games being called "sports" in the Olympics.  We already have artistic ribbon twirling, what's next Olympic Texas Hold'em?
This i fear.....its getting very popular with the tv stations
Can't you just picture Doyle "Texas Dolly" Brunson up on the podium, leaning on his cane, taking a medal? Gray Power!
